'''SMMU''', or '''Smack My Marine Up''', is a [[source port]], derived from [[MBF]], developed by Simon Howard. This port is no longer maintained and its official successor is [[Eternity Engine]].
SMMU introduced several features to MBF, most of which are independently available in [[ZDoom]]. * A [[console]], a chasecam and the ability to change the [[FOV]] * [[Doom Legacy]] [[S_SKIN|player skin]] support * Colored [[sector]]s, which can be achieved with [[Sector_SetColor]] * A start map to select skill; which can be imitated with the [[ChangeSkill]] special and the '''noskillmenu''' [[MAPINFO/Episode definition|episode property]] * "Swirling" floors, similar to what can be obtained with the '''warp''' or '''warp2''' commands in [[ANIMDEFS]] * An '''A_NailBomb''' codepointer for use in [[DeHackEd]], which can be emulated with [[A_Explode]] * [[FraggleScript]]
== External links == * [http://www.soulsphere.org/projects/smmu/ Homepage] (very outdated, many external links are dead)
